My designs are

From loading a web page to sending an IM, every action on the web requires energy. If the internet were a country, it will rank #4 in the world for its rate of emissions by 2025. To protect our planetary boundaries, we must design products that are future-friendly, and do not consume excessive resources. Selecting green hosting services, thoughtfully using images and videos, and writing performant code are the most impactful things web developers can do to shift toward a regenerative web and a clean earth for future generations.

Exponential tech is driving an era of extreme change in society, and as stewards of this tech, we can use it to address the existential crises of our time by improving our collective problem solving capacity, and reinforcing the rationality and sense-making ability of democratic societies. For this we must create technologies that are sensitive to human nature, and avoid addictive, manipulative, and exploitative design patterns.

Available to all people, regardless of their hardware, language, location, or abilities. I strive to maintain the inclusive culture of the internet by focusing on, above all, a high quality user experience that adheres to responsive design, internationalization, and W3C standards.

I aim to find straightforward, simple solutions to complex problems, and document them with consistent formatting using JSDoc. In a team setting, code readability can make or break a deadline. Over time, it reduces technical debt and improves the output of the team.

Scalability is a system's capacity to grow, while extensibility is the ability to add new functionality. Modularity, encapsulation, and following a layered design pattern (like MVC or MVVC) at the application level dictates a clear separation of concerns that allows applications to handle more users and features with grace. These concepts are at the forefront of my approach when designing features of any size.

Time Blocker

A web-based time block planner made with React, useReducer, and Context API.

Ecommerce Site

A generic ecommerce site with Stipe payments and serverless functions. Redux and useReducer variants.

Github User Search

An app that uses the Github API to search for users and aggregates data onto Fusion Charts.
